description: Structured information on a used license.
label: License
name: License

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN._instruction: Enter the full name of this license.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.description: Whole, non-abbreviated name of something or somebody.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.label: Full name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.name: fullName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/legal._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) pointing to the legal code of this license.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/legal.description: Type of legislation that claims to cover the law system (complete or parts) as it existed at the time the code was enacted.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/legal.label: Legal code
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/legal.name: legalCode

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short._instruction: Enter the short name of this license.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short.description: Shortened or fully abbreviated name of something or somebody.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short.label: Short name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short.name: shortName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/webpa._instruction: Enter one or several webpages related to this license (e.g. homepage).
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/webpa.description: Hypertext document (block of information) found on the World Wide Web.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/webpa.label: Webpage
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/webpa.name: webpage
